# Mean, Median, Range
## R Folder

This folder contains the R script for the mean_median_range function that was created to calculate the mean, median and range values for any given numerical dataset. 
In addition to containing the code for the mean_median_range function, the R folder also includes the roxygen2 documentation. The roxygen2 skeleton contains a description, parameters, details, return, examples, import and export section.
